markets.title: Will the U.S. impose tariffs on pharmaceuticals from any country in Sep 2025-Sep 2026?
markets.rules_primary: If the President of the United States has imposed any new (or increased) tariffs in September 2025 on pharmaceuticals of any country, then the market resolves to Yes.
markets.rules_secondary: The tariffs must be imposed through executive actions including bills signed by the President or actions by the Department of Commerce. The tariffs must be in effect for at least some businesses during the specified period to qualify. Conditional tariffs (e.g., "Tariffs will be imposed if...") do not satisfy the criterion until they are actually imposed. The market resolves based on tariffs that are announced and take effect, not merely proposed or threatened. Increases to existing tariff rates count as new tariffs. Tariffs can be sector-specific or apply broadly. Trade blocs like the European Union can be specified as the country. "Any country" or "any sector" options resolve to Yes if tariffs are imposed on at least one country or sector respectively.
markets.early_close_condition: This market will close and expire early if qualifying tariffs are imposed.

markets.title: Will tariffs on pharmaceuticals come into effect before Dec 2025?
markets.rules_primary: If the President imposes any new (or raised) tariffs on pharmaceutical imports before Dec 31, 2025, then the market resolves to Yes.
markets.early_close_condition: This market will close and expire early if the event occurs.
